body: lmao the plot in here is much more interesting than the actual sexy time scenes.

We finally got the reveal of the culprit! It was pretty obvious that Masato's older brother was the culprit but i thought that Masato himself was actually working with his older brother. Can't wait for ch 6 and possibly the last chapter. This was such a good doujin. definitely deserves to get a hentai adaptation

At this point, I'm more interested in the story and Its pretty good. Feels more like a smut manga than hentai though. I hope they mesh them all together into one once it's finished so I don't have to look for the different chapters.
My man fuuga just draws hentai for the plot holy shit
There is so many twist damn can't wait for chapter 6...

I still say this one is good as a manga but bad as a hentai because right now you can tell that 6/10 readers just don't care about sex scenes anymore, except they happened to like the siblings (Mei), and you can fully tell it was just "there" to attracted more readers. The next chapter will be the last and has the best ones for both though. And that's where the sibling's sex scene is supposed to be IMO. You'll see.
Anyway, if anyone like this story they should considered buying official digital copy from authorized websites such as DMM or DLSite (if there's one on them - just type ふしだらな兄妹 in search tab). Fuuga needs all the supports he can get.
fire story, im really looking to this last chapter
Dying to see the conclusion to this
